The common type of two {{tt|basic_const_iterator}}s or a {{tt|basic_const_iterator}} and another iterator type is a {{tt|basic_const_iterator}} of the common underlying type.

The common type is defined only if {{c|T}} and {{c|U}} share a common type which models {{lconcept|input_iterator}}.
